li.label: ate living meat
li.description: It was even writhing in my mouth and oesophagus with the taste of blood. It was simply horrible.

li.label: ate flesh cube
li.description: This blasphemy was never designed from the beginning to be eaten by humans!

li.label: ate tentacle mooncake
li.description: I have to admit this weird thing tastes unexpectedly delicious... If only it wouldn't suddenly squirm in my mouth.

li.label: Lower Neural Symbiosis
li.description: Lower Neural Symbiosis is not very effective, or so it seems that it worked well but the side effects were noticeable. my mind was filled with thoughts of discomfort due to the connection.

li.label: {0} replaced by bloody evil
li.description: We watched the monster emerge from the body, not even knowing when it replaced someone else... or whether that person was never human in the first place.

li.label: {0} turned into a monster
li.description: It was terrifying to see someone transform into a monster right in front of us.

li.label: {0} nothing left
li.description: One of the people closest to me even had his identity taken away by a monster, leaving nothing behind.
